summary: 今日焦点集中于提升大模型可靠性与推理能力：从共识分解执行、自 Debate 强化到记忆增强的多代理协同，均指向构建更稳健、可验证的智能系统；同时，人机对齐、安全测试（如醉酒语言诱导）及数学发现等应用探索，凸显AI从理论向高阶实践落地的关键进展。

news.title: JAF: Judge Agent Forest
news.comment: JAF提出judge agent协同推理新范式，显著提升评估与自反思能力，是agentic AI关键进展

news.title: The Six Sigma Agent: Achieving Enterprise-Grade Reliability in LLM Systems Through Consensus-Driven Decomposed Execution
news.comment: 六西格玛Agent提出共识驱动分解执行框架，显著提升LLM企业级可靠性，具实用价值

news.title: Why Reasoning Fails to Plan: A Planning-Centric Analysis of Long-Horizon Decision Making in LLM Agents
news.comment: 首次从规划中心视角揭示LLM代理长程决策失败根源，为构建真正长时序智能提供理论框架

news.title: Sparks of Rationality: Do Reasoning LLMs Align with Human Judgment and Choice?
news.comment: 首篇系统性评估LLM理性决策能力的高质量论文，为AI决策可信性提供关键实证支持。

news.title: Learning Provably Correct Distributed Protocols Without Human Knowledge
news.comment: 首次将分布式协议设计建模为不完全信息博弈搜索问题，提出GGMS框架突破传统学习方法局限，具重要理论与实践价值。

news.title: Semi-Autonomous Mathematics Discovery with Gemini: A Case Study on the Erd\H{o}s Problems
news.comment: AI辅助数学发现取得实质性进展，验证了大模型在高阶推理中的潜力

news.title: In Vino Veritas and Vulnerabilities: Examining LLM Safety via Drunk Language Inducement
news.comment: 首次将醉酒语言作为攻击载体研究LLM安全，方法创新且实验严谨，具实用价值。

news.title: Prepare Reasoning Language Models for Multi-Agent Debate with Self-Debate Reinforcement Learning
news.comment: 提出Self-Debate RL框架，融合单模型推理与多智能体辩论优势，是LLM推理能力提升的重要进展。

news.title: MERMAID: Memory-Enhanced Retrieval and Reasoning with Multi-Agent Iterative Knowledge Grounding for Veracity Assessment
news.comment: MERMAID提出记忆增强多智能体框架，显著提升事实核查中检索与推理的协同效率。

news.title: Context Structure Reshapes the Representational Geometry of Language Models
news.comment: 首次系统性揭示上下文学习中表示直化现象的双轨机制，推动对LLM内部动态理解
